categories: XT 11 Speed Chainring SM-CRM81 for FC-M8000-1
description: Shimano XT quality to complete your 1x11 speed drivetrain. Carbon fiber reinforced polymer chainring with stainless steel teeths makes a very stiff, light and durable chainring.Tooth profile is designed to improve chain retention.Designed to be paired with the FC-M8000 crankset.Compatible with 1x10 and 1x11 speed drivetrains.BCD is 96mm.
name: Shimano XT 11 Speed Chainring SM-CRM81 for FC-M8000-1x11
